description: This React component, AuditLog, displays a real-time audit log by subscribing to activity events via Supabase Realtime.It maintains a list of recent events and renders them in a list format, with a note about persistence.

methods.name: AuditLog()
methods.description: React functional component that displays a real-time audit log by subscribing to activity events using useRealtime hook.

methods.name: onMessage
methods.description: Callback function that updates the events state when a new activity event is received.
